content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseDelimitedTextFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseDelimitedTextFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT ,
	       FORMAT_OPTIONS (
			 FIELD_TERMINATOR = ',',
			 USE_TYPE_DEFAULT = FALSE
			))
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'documents_thinguyendls_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [documents_thinguyendls_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://documents@thinguyendls.dfs.core.windows.net', 
		TYPE = HADOOP 
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE mapping (
	[C1] nvarchar(4000),
	[C2] nvarchar(4000),
	[C3] nvarchar(4000),
	[C4] nvarchar(4000),
	[C5] nvarchar(4000),
	[C6] nvarchar(4000),
	[C7] nvarchar(4000),
	[C8] nvarchar(4000),
	[C9] nvarchar(4000),
	[C10] nvarchar(4000),
	[C11] nvarchar(4000),
	[C12] nvarchar(4000),
	[C13] nvarchar(4000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'CSVFiles/TB VSA Mapping Template.xlsx.csv',
	DATA_SOURCE = [documents_thinguyendls_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseDelimitedTextFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.mapping
GO
